attributes.action: Family Allowance for one child only
attributes.additional_details:
There are too many people who are just breeding machines and most are not from this country.  They are here to milk the benefits society that under Labour has blossomed out of control.

It should not be allowed that money paid in benefits is sent abroad and that child benefit is paid only to the first child.

Also child benefit should not be paid unless the parents (both) have spent at least two years in this country, irrespective of any asylum or other immigration status
